name: Maven Global
slogan: Digital Design Partner for companies and organisations
description: Working with marketing mangers to help them exceed their goals and expectations through top notch design

jobs.title: Frontend developer
jobs.description:
Background:
Maven is an ambitious, goal orientated, and fun boutique digital design agency based in London. We are seeking a Senior/ Lead Front End Web Developer, to start immediately, to join our team in Bermondsey. The Front End Web Developer will work within a small tight knit multi-disciplinary team and help us deliver better digital and creative solutions for our clients.

Based in our London office, and working directly alongside the Creative Director, the web developer will be part of a studio team of 6 that helps to deliver a wide range of digital solutions for our clients.

We’re looking for someone passionate about the web, nicely crafted websites and interactive content, with excellent front-end development skills and (as a plus, but not required) back-end knowledge.

The candidate will be working both on client and internal assignments including websites and interactive mini-creatives. They will lead the front end web development efforts, help manage a freelance network and drive front end development within the agency.

We are looking for someone with 3 to 5 years’ experience who also has an eye for design and is at ease working alongside graphic designers and in bringing to life complex online layouts.

All candidates will have an outstanding portfolio of digital solutions that includes high quality pixel work and shows are clear understanding and delivery of front end web development.


The Role/ key responsibilities, but not limited to:
• Lead the development and QA processes of web projects
• Support the Creative Director in architecting and planning project solutions—cost estimation, specifications documentation, prototyping, assess feasibility
• Work closely alongside other developers and design team to deliver 
• Working positively to tight deadlines and being flexible if goal posts move


Required experience/ skills:
• Computer Science or related degree
• 3 - 5 years’ experience - Agency background preferred
• Expert in front-end web development: HTML5/CSS3, JavaScript/jQuery
• Expert in standards-based, cross-browser, multi-device development and responsive web
• HTML5 Creatives production both for desktop and mobile platforms
• HTML5 Rich Media (expanding, tandem and video creatives)
• Knowledge of working with Adobe XD preferred
• Experience with popular CMS engines

The Front End Web Developer will work within a small tight knit multi-disciplinary team and help us deliver better digital and creative solutions for our clients.

Based in our London office, and working directly alongside the Creative Director, the web developer will be part of a studio team of 6 that helps to deliver a wide range of digital solutions for our clients.

We’re looking for someone passionate about the web, nicely crafted websites and interactive content, with excellent front-end development skills and (as a plus, but not required) back-end knowledge.

The candidate will be working both on client and internal assignments including websites and interactive mini-creatives. They will lead the front end web development efforts, help manage a freelance network and drive front end development within the agency.

We are looking for someone with 3 to 5 years’ experience who also has an eye for design and is at ease working alongside graphic designers and in bringing to life complex online layouts.

All candidates will have an outstanding portfolio of digital solutions that includes high quality pixel work and shows are clear understanding and delivery of front end web development.

The Role/ key responsibilities, but not limited to:
• Lead the development and QA processes of web projects
